executiveSummary: Jordan Baroque and Daniel Foglesson, founders of Three Jerks Jerky, pitched their premium filet mignon beef jerky seeking $100,000 for 15% equity. After multiple offers from the Sharks, they ultimately accepted a deal from Daymond John for $150,000 in exchange for 33% equity to help scale their business nationwide.
keyDecisions: Three Jerks Jerky accepted Daymond Johnâ€™s offer of $150,000 for 33% equity.

actionItems.task: Partner with Daymond John to accelerate national growth and scale production.
Use investment funds to purchase inventory in bulk and reduce cost of goods.

nextSteps: The founders will begin working with Daymond John to expand into national retail chains, improve cost efficiency through bulk purchasing, and strengthen brand positioning in the competitive jerky market.
